segments.text: Hey Suzie . Guess what ? I'm having a baby !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I'm so excited . We've been trying for 8 months now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's really exciting . How many months are you pregnant ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you going to find out if it is a boy or a girl ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to , but Bob doesn't . He wants to be surprised like the old fashioned way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe it's more exciting not knowing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd rather know and buy all the baby things ahead of time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are so many things you have to prepare for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know I am going to be busy , but I know I can handle it . I have been looking forward to this day for a long long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It really must be an exciting time for you guys .
segments.speaker: S2
